verses.name: Ezra 2:64
verses.text: The whole congregation together was forty and two thousand three hundred and threescore,

verses.name: Ezra 2:65
verses.text: Beside their servants and their maids, of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and there were among them two hundred singing men and singing women.

verses.name: Ezra 2:66
verses.text: Their horses were seven hundred thirty and six; their mules, two hundred forty and five;

verses.name: Ezra 2:67
verses.text: Their camels, four hundred thirty and five; their asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.
